description:
While Lina`s party continues to look for a copy of the Bible, Zerros brings them the information that a perfect copy is at a castle nearby.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le temple du sable ! (Le secret du Giga Slave)
Suna no Shinden! Giga Slave no Himitsu!
Templul de nisip / Secretul sclavului Giga
The Temple of Sand! The Secret of the Giga Slave!
Храм в песках! Тайна Гига Слэйва!
砂の神殿! ギガスレイブの秘密!
